channel.title: business cycles on Jun Wong
channel.description: Recent content in business cycles on Jun Wong

item.title: Business Cycles and How to Tame Them
item.description: This minicourse describes business cycles, develops a matching model to explain them, and discusses how monetary and fiscal policy can tame them.

item.title: Economic Slack
item.description: This graduate course presents matching models of economic slack and uses them to study business-cycle fluctuations, monetary policy, and fiscal policy.

item.title: Unemployment
item.description: This graduate course presents matching models of unemployment and uses them to study unemployment fluctuations, job rationing, and labor market policies.

item.title: Intermediate Macroeconomics
item.description: This undergraduate course covers IS-LM model of business cycles, matching model of unemployment, inflation, and Malthusian and Solowian models of growth.
